ygData.authorName: At the corner of Sodom and Gommorah with
ygData.from: At the corner of Sodom and Gommorah without a roadmap <douglas@...
ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can.  You can t target NPCs if you ve lost target, but I ve targeted myself and cast cure blindness in the middle of a PvP situation using hotkeys. --
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 19 Jul 1999, I. G wrote:

> If you are blinded you can not even use hotkeys.... *sigh* I know this from
> personal exp. Damn the mudmen!!!!!!!

You can. You can't target NPCs if you've lost target, but I've targeted
myself and cast cure blindness in the middle of a PvP situation using
hotkeys.

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
